architectural_elements.name: Long Dining Table
architectural_elements.description: A massive wooden table with intricate carvings, set for a meal that was never finished. The tablecloth is stained and tattered.

architectural_elements.name: High-Backed Chairs
architectural_elements.description: Ornate chairs with velvet upholstery, some broken or covered in dust.

architectural_elements.name: Chandelier
architectural_elements.description: A large, flickering chandelier above the table, with missing crystals or broken bulbs.

architectural_elements.name: Wainscoting
architectural_elements.description: Dark wooden paneling on the lower walls, some panels loose or cracked.

architectural_elements.name: Large Windows
architectural_elements.description: Tall windows with heavy, moth-eaten curtains, allowing eerie moonlight to filter in.

furniture_and_decor.name: China Cabinet
furniture_and_decor.description: A glass-front cabinet displaying fine china, some pieces broken or missing.

furniture_and_decor.name: Sideboard
furniture_and_decor.description: A long sideboard with tarnished silverware, dusty plates, and half-empty decanters.

furniture_and_decor.name: Table Settings
furniture_and_decor.description: Plates, bowls, and cutlery arranged for a meal, some cracked or stained.

furniture_and_decor.name: Candelabras
furniture_and_decor.description: Silver or brass candelabras with half-melted candles, flickering ominously.

furniture_and_decor.name: Portraits
furniture_and_decor.description: Paintings of past family members, some with eyes that follow the player.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across the chandelier, corners, and furniture.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the air, visible in shafts of light or moonlight.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Candles or chandeliers that flicker unpredictably, casting eerie shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Presence
atmospheric_details.description: Translucent figures sitting at the table or standing in the corners, disappearing when approached.

atmospheric_details.name: Echoing Sounds
atmospheric_details.description: Faint clinking of silverware, whispers, or the sound of a chair scraping.

interactive_objects.name: Rotting Food
interactive_objects.description: Plates of food that appear fresh but turn rotten or moldy when inspected.

interactive_objects.name: Letter or Note
interactive_objects.description: A handwritten note or letter left on the table, hinting at the mansionâ€™s dark history.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A small, intricate pocket watch hidden in a drawer or under a plate, tied to a puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Key
interactive_objects.description: A rusty key hidden in a drawer, under a plate, or inside a decanter.

interactive_objects.name: Wine Bottles
interactive_objects.description: Dusty wine bottles, some filled with blood-like liquid or glowing substances.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Curtains or tablecloths gently moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, adding to the eerie atmosphere.

environmental_effects.name: Bloodstains
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains on the tablecloth, plates, or floor, hinting at past violence.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Dust
environmental_effects.description: Dust particles or ash drifting down from the ceiling or chandelier.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Streaming through the windows, casting long, eerie shadows across the table.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles on the table or sideboard, creating a ghostly ambiance.

lighting.name: Fireplace Glow
lighting.description: A faint, ghostly glow from a nearby fireplace, even if it's not lit.
